attributes.additional_details:
Expand the smoking ban to a set area around doorways to allow non smokers to enter premises without having to walk through a wall of smokers.

Expand the smoking ban to public house gardens and have a set smoking area to allow non smokers to enjoy public houses in the summer

Expand the smoking ban to ALL land owned by hospitals, to discourage patients and visitors smoking

Expand the smoking ban to vehicles, you're not allowed to eat or drink, but having a small fire in your hand is acceptable?
